name: Az Hul Adventures
description:
Az Hul Adventures is the first game released by Ugly Munkey Studio and was created in collaboration with Team Best One.

Ugly Munkey Studio:

David D - Programmer, Artist

Chris B - Music

Team Best One:

Chell R - Team Lead, Programmer

Brian S - Programmer

Alex S - Programmer

Jason R - Level Designer

Harold N - Tester
